classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B1, B2, B3, (B4 [lab] must be completed with either B2 or B3), B1-B5 elective, C2, C3, C4, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, and F. C4, D5, and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Two (2) courses must be completed from B1. C4 cannot be fulfilled with SPAN, FR, or GER courses. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C3, C4, D1, D3, D4, D5, or F.

Any Secondary Language Elementary Course OR Minor Course can go here.

Secondary language: French, German, Mandarin Chinese, or other language approved by Department Chair. Required coursework for approved secondary language that is not available through Cal Poly must be fulfilled through approved transfer credit. Or, with advisor and chair approval, choose an Individual Course of Study (ICS) which will consist of coursework from a declared academic minor and upper-division Spanish. These courses cannot be used to satisfy Primary Language requirements, Approved language/culture electives, or Free Electives.

If Mandarin Chinese is selected as the student's secondary language concentration, a department-approved upper-division course with significant Chinese culture and critical thinking components will be substituted for this course.

2-8 units of Spanish 300-400 level coursework must be taken to supplement minors with less than 32 units of required coursework.
